title: Bug 7206rename method parameters panel needs work
description: The panel for renaming methods has low usability.The old names for theparameters are unsorted  they are not in declaration order or alphabeticalorder.If the names are not mneumonic (and why would you rename them otherwise) it ishard to determine what to rename them to.That is, should "arg0" be servlet,mapping or request?(I'm tripping across this renaming overloaded Strutsaction methods).I would suggest:1) Sort by declaration order2) Add a column to display the type3) Merge this and the parameter ordering panel into a single operation
